title._content: Looking West from "Witness" office, St. James Street, Montreal, QC, 1886, copied about 1900

description._content: MP-0000.1823.1 Looking West from "Witness" office, St. James Street, Montreal, QC, 1886, copied about 1900 George Charles Arless About 1900, 19th century or 20th century Notman photographic Archives - McCord Museum MP-0000.1823.1 Vue en direction ouest depuis le bureau « Witness », rue Saint-Jacques, Montréal, QC, 1886, copie réalisée vers 1900 George Charles Arless Vers 1900, 19e siècle ou 20e siècle Archives photographiques Notman - Musée McCord To see the image file on the McCord Museum website, click on the following link: www.musee-mccord.qc.ca/en/collection/artifacts/MP-0000.18...
